name: Gold Duck don't know what's up
name_original: Gold Duck don't know what's up
description:
Gold Duck don't know what's up is a simple game made for the GMTK jam of 2017.

You play as a duck that will bob up and down and try to go through the tubes on top of the water. If you are in the air gravity will pull you down but if you are in the water you will get pushed to the surface. Try to get a good flow going in order to make it through as many tubes before time runs out, But make sure to watch out for planes and fish!

Controls:  Space bar (This will push you either up or down depending on whether or not you are in the air or in the water)

This was my first game jam and it was a lot of fun. Thank you GMTK for putting this together and thank you Kimber and Wes for doing the art.
